InstructionData.Title: FSAVE - Filter Saver
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Filter Saver alias GasSensor d0 alias O2Filter d1 alias CO2Filter d2 alias N2Filter d3 alias H2Filter d4 alias XFilter d5
alias device r0 alias ratio r1 alias pressure r2 alias pp r3 alias poweron r4
loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure
l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen mul pp ratio pressure move device 1 jal filter
l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul pp ratio pressure move device 2 jal filter
l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen mul pp ratio pressure move device 3 jal filter
l ratio GasSensor RatioVolatiles mul pp ratio pressure move device 4 jal filter
l ratio GasSensor RatioPollutant mul pp ratio pressure move device 5 jal filter
yield j loop
filter: bdns dr0 ra sge poweron pp 95 s dr0 On poweron j ra
